description: The ProcessorMetrics schema contains usage and health statistics for a processor.

BandwidthPercent.description: The bandwidth usage of this processor as a percentage.
BandwidthPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the bandwidth usage of the processor as a percentage, typically `0` to `100`.  When this resource is subordinate to the ProcessorSummary object, this property shall be the CPU utilization over all processors as a percentage.

title: #ProcessorMetrics.v1_6_4.ProcessorMetrics
